summary: Create a website for the shop "Beniwal Music Center" featuring information about tractor music systems, tractor modification materials, electrical mechanic services, and contact details (more info to be added later).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Logo mark + wordmark reading “Beniwal Music Center”, bold automotive/tractor-shop style, high contrast (bmc-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero banner illustration featuring a tractor silhouette and speakers/audio theme, warm rugged palette (bmc-hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive website titled “Beniwal Music Center” with a clear home/landing section that introduces the shop and summarizes the main offerings.
Add a dedicated section for “Tractor Music Systems” describing the products/services offered (informational content only; no checkout required).
Add a dedicated section for “Tractor Modification Materials” and include messaging that the materials are available at reasonable prices.
Add a dedicated section describing “Electrical Mechanic Services” and clearly state that an electrical mechanic is available.
Add a “Contact” section with contact information fields that can be filled in later (use clear placeholders such as phone number, address, and business hours).
Add simple navigation (e.g., header links) to jump to: Home, Tractor Music Systems, Tractor Modification Materials, Electrical Mechanic Services, and Contact.
Apply a cohesive visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and section styling) suitable for a tractor/automotive shop brand; avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Add generated static image assets (logo + hero banner) to the site and store them under frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website titled "Beniwal Music Center"
Add a home page describing the shop and its offerings
Add a section for tractor music systems products/services
Add a section for tractor modification materials (reasonable price messaging)
Add a section describing electrical mechanic availability/services
